experiences.name: UI/UX Designer

experiences.description: With 5+ years of experience in sales, I excelled in customer service, exceeded targets, and developed strong problem-solving skills. These abilities have sharpened my communication skills and teamwork, which I apply daily in tech projects and collaborations.

experiences.name: Studies
experiences.description: I studied Communication Design at the University of La Plata for two years, gaining valuable skills in design and communication. Additionally, I have completed several courses in development and design, and I'm preparing to start my studies in Computer Science in Copenhagen in the upcoming year.
